movies.title: Kumbalangi Nights
movies.description: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.

movies.title: Super Deluxe
movies.description: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged father, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

movies.title: The Lunchbox
movies.description: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

movies.title: Anbe Sivam
movies.description: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

movies.title: Pariyerum Perumal
movies.description: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

movies.title: Mayaanadhi
movies.description: The life of Mathan, a mule driver in a gang and Aparna an aspiring actress.

movies.title: Raatchasan
movies.description: A Sub-Inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally

movies.title: Kaakkaa Muttai
movies.description: Two slum kids want nothing more than a slice of pizza.

movies.title: 3 Idiots
movies.description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them idiots.

movies.title: Bangalore Days
movies.description: Three cousins set out to fulfill their Bangalore dreams.

movies.title: Chak de! India
movies.description: Kabir Khan is the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team and his dream is to make his all girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

movies.title: Gully Boy
movies.description: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

movies.title: Andhadhun
movies.description: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

movies.title: Thalapathi
movies.description: An orphan named Surya raised in a slum befriends a good crime boss named Devaraj and works for him. Their existence is threatened when a new honest district collector arrives.
